title: Number of professionals at the leading accounting firms in the U.S. 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of professionals for 25 number of Accounting firms.
The Number of professionals is appeared to be the highest at Accounting firm Deloitte and lowest at Accounting firm Mazars USA.
The difference of Number of professionals between the highest and lowest Accounting firm is 73254.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of professionals for 25 number of Accounting firms.
The maximum Number of professionals 73855.0 is found at Accounting firm Deloitte and the minimum is found at Mazars USA where Number of professionals is 601.0.
